togoption.label: Verbose
togoption.tooltip: Turn on verbose debugging message

togoption.label: DetectMemoryLeaks
togoption.tooltip: Track mallocs/frees using TAU's memory wrapper

togoption.label: PdtGnuFortranParser
togoption.tooltip: Specify the GNU gfortran PDT parser gfparse instead of f95parse

togoption.label: PdtCleanscapeParser
togoption.tooltip: Specify the Cleanscape Fortran parser

togoption.label: PreProcess
togoption.tooltip: Preprocess the source code before parsing. Uses /usr/bin/cpp -P by default.

togoption.label: KeepFiles
togoption.tooltip: Does not remove intermediate .pdb and .inst.* files

togoption.label: Shared
togoption.tooltip: Use shared library version of TAU.

togoption.label: PdtDir
togoption.tooltip: PDT architecture directory. Typically $(PDTDIR)/$(PDTARCHDIR)

togoption.label: PdtF95Opts
togoption.tooltip: Options for Fortran parser in PDT (f95parse)

togoption.label: PdtF95Reset
togoption.tooltip: Reset options to the Fortran parser to the given list

togoption.label: PdtCOpts
togoption.tooltip: Options for C parser in PDT (cparse). Typically $(TAU_MPI_INCLUDE) $(TAU_INCLUDE) $(TAU_DEFS)

togoption.label: PdtCReset
togoption.tooltip: Reset options to the C parser to the given list

togoption.label: PdtCxxOpts
togoption.tooltip: Options for C++ parser in PDT (cxxparse). Typically $(TAU_MPI_INCLUDE) $(TAU_INCLUDE) $(TAU_DEFS)

togoption.label: PdtCxxReset
togoption.tooltip: Reset options to the C++ parser to the given list

togoption.label: PdtF90Parser
togoption.tooltip: Specify a different Fortran parser. For e.g., f90parse instead of f95parse

togoption.label: PdtUser
togoption.tooltip: Optional arguments for parsing source code

togoption.label: TauInstr
togoption.tooltip: Specify location of tau_instrumentor. Typically $(TAUROOT)/$(CONFIG_ARCH)/bin/tau_instrumentor

togoption.label: CPP
togoption.tooltip: Specify an alternative preprocessor and pre-process the sources.

togoption.label: CPPOpts
togoption.tooltip: Specify additional options to the C pre-processor.

togoption.label: CPPReset
togoption.tooltip: Reset C preprocessor options to the specified list.

togoption.label: PDBFile
togoption.tooltip: Specify PDB file for tau_instrumentor. Skips parsing stage.

togoption.label: Tau
togoption.tooltip: Specify options for tau_instrumentor

togoption.label: Compile
togoption.tooltip: Options passed to the compiler by the user.

togoption.label: TauDefs
togoption.tooltip: Options passed to the compiler by TAU. Typically $(TAU_DEFS)

togoption.label: TauIncludes
togoption.tooltip: Options passed to the compiler by TAU. Typically $(TAU_MPI_INCLUDE) $(TAU_INCLUDE)

togoption.label: IncludeMemory
togoption.tooltip: Flags for replacement of malloc/free. Typically -I$(TAU_DIR)/include/Memory

togoption.label: Reset
togoption.tooltip: Reset options to the compiler to the given list

togoption.label: Linking
togoption.tooltip: Options passed to the linker. Typically $(TAU_MPI_FLIBS) $(TAU_LIBS) $(TAU_CXXLIBS)

togoption.label: LinkReset
togoption.tooltip: Reset options to the linker to the given list

togoption.label: TauCC
togoption.tooltip: Specifies the C compiler used by TAU

togoption.label: UseCXXForC
togoption.tooltip: Specifies the use of a C++ compiler for compiling C code

togoption.label: OpariTool
togoption.tooltip: Specifies the location of the Opari tool

togoption.label: OpariDir
togoption.tooltip: Specifies the location of the Opari directory

togoption.label: OpariOpts
togoption.tooltip: Specifies optional arguments to the Opari tool

togoption.label: OpariReset
togoption.tooltip: Resets options passed to the Opari tool

togoption.label: NoMpi
togoption.tooltip: Removes -l*mpi* libraries during linking (default)

togoption.label: Mpi
togoption.tooltip: Does not remove -l*mpi* libraries during linking

togoption.label: NoRevert
togoption.tooltip: Exit on error. Does not revert to the original compilation rule on error.

togoption.label: Revert
togoption.tooltip: Revert to the original compilation rule on error (default).

togoption.label: AppCC
togoption.tooltip: pecifies the fallback C compiler.

togoption.label: AppCXX
togoption.tooltip: Specifies the fallback CXX compiler.

togoption.label: AppF90
togoption.tooltip: Specifies the fallback F90 compiler.

togoption.label: DisableHeaderInst
togoption.tooltip: Disable instrumentation of headers

togoption.label: CompInst
togoption.tooltip: Use compiler-based instrumentation.

togoption.label: PDTInst
togoption.tooltip: Use PDT-based instrumentation.

togoption.label: noCompInst
togoption.tooltip: Do not auto-revert to compiler based instrumentation if PDT instrumentation fails.

togoption.label: TauSelectFile
togoption.tooltip: Specify selective instrumentation file for tau_instrumentor

togoption.label: Verbose Output
togoption.tooltip: Enable verbose diagnostic output

togoption.label: Enable Profiling
togoption.tooltip: Generate TAU profile output

togoption.label: Profile Output Directory
togoption.tooltip: Location of profile output. Current directory by default. Changing this may disable automatic profile storage.

togoption.label: Callpath Profiling
togoption.tooltip: Generate TAU callpath profiles

togoption.label: Set Callpath Depth
togoption.tooltip: Sets depth of callpaths

togoption.label: Overhead Compensation
togoption.tooltip: Adjust recorded time values to allow for instrumentation overhead

togoption.label: Track Message
togoption.tooltip: Track individual MPI message statistics

togoption.label: Communication Matrix
togoption.tooltip: Generate MPI communication matrix

togoption.label: Enable Throttling
togoption.tooltip: Throttle out lightweight routines

togoption.label: Throttle Percall
togoption.tooltip: Runtime throttling per call threshold (e.g. less than 10 microseconds per call)

togoption.label: Throttle Numcalls
togoption.tooltip: Runtime throttling number of calls threshold (e.g. at least 100000 calls)

togoption.label: Enable Tracing
togoption.tooltip: Generate TAU trace output

togoption.label: Trace Output Directory
togoption.tooltip: Location of trace output. Current directory by default.

togoption.label: Synchronize Clocks
togoption.tooltip: Synchronize different MPI process clocks for tracing

togoption.label: Track Heap
togoption.tooltip: Track memory heap usage at function entry/exit with a context event

togoption.label: Track Headroom
togoption.tooltip: Track memory headroom availability at function entry/exit with a context event
